steps.action: Determine responsible DSO based on location
steps.details: Use province and municipality to identify DSO service territory
Review DSO capacity maps and congestion information
Gather site details, power requirements, timeline
Via mijnaansluiting.nl or directly to DSO for large-scale connections
DSO assesses technical feasibility and capacity availability
DSO provides cost estimate and connection agreement
Physical installation and grid connection activation

important_notes: Grid congestion is a significant issue across all major DSOs in the Netherlands
Early engagement with DSOs is critical for timely project delivery
Border locations between DSO territories may require clarification of responsibility
Large truck charging installations may require dedicated transformer stations
Flexibility contracts and load management can help optimize limited grid capacity
EU regulations mandate extensive truck charging infrastructure by 2030
Multiple funding and subsidy programs available for charging infrastructure
